event.title: Open Source ERP Users Group / the 6th seminar
event.catch: オープンソースERP ユーザー会 / 第6回勉強会
event.description:
Time Table

  1. Opening (はじめに) [13:00-13:10]

  2. Recent Movements (最近の動き) [13:10 – 13:20]

    • Up-to-date information of Open Source ERP (オープンソースERP最新動向)
  3. Introductory Topic (入門編) [13:20 – 14:20]

  4. Special Topic (特別編) [14:30 – 16:30]

    • iDempiere World Conference Report from Red1 (iDempiere World Conferenceの報告)

    • Q/A with Red1 (Red1とのQ/A)
  5. Open Project (オープンプロジェクト) [16:40 – 17:10]

    • Creating Client and setting for Accounting Schema (Client作成および会計設定)

Materials (unfinished)

Trial Project
Demo Environment

Registration Fee (参加料)

free (無料)
